card.name: Millicent, Restless Revenant
card.property: Affinity for Spirits (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Spirit you control.) Flying Whenever Millicent or another nontoken Spirit you control dies or deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Strefan, Maurer Progenitor
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your end step, create a Blood token for each player who lost life this turn. Whenever Strefan attacks, you may sacrifice two Blood tokens. If you do, you may put a Vampire card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Donal, Herald of Wings
card.property: Whenever you cast a nonlegendary creature spell with flying, you may copy it, except the copy is a 1/1 Spirit in addition to its other types. Do this only once each turn. (The copy becomes a token.)

card.name: Timothar, Baron of Bats
card.property: Ward—Discard a card. Whenever another nontoken Vampire you control dies, you may pay {1} and exile it. If you do, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying. It gains "When this token deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and return the exiled card to the battlefield tapped."

card.name: Drogskol Reinforcements
card.property: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.) Other Spirits you control have melee. Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to Spirits you control.

card.name: Haunted Library
card.property: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Priest of the Blessed Graf
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of opponents who control more lands than you.

card.name: Rhoda, Geist Avenger
card.property: Partner with Timin, Youthful Geist (When this creature enters, target player may put Timin into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Vigilance Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, put a +1/+1 counter on Rhoda.

card.name: Storm of Souls
card.property: Return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Each of them is a 1/1 Spirit with flying in addition to its other types. Exile Storm of Souls.

card.name: Sudden Salvation
card.property: Choose up to three target permanent cards in graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. Return them to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control. You draw a card for each opponent who controls one or more of those permanents.

card.name: Breath of the Sleepless
card.property: You may cast Spirit spells as though they had flash. Whenever you cast a creature spell during an opponent's turn, tap up to one target creature.

card.name: Ethereal Investigator
card.property: Flying When this creature enters, investigate X times, where X is the number of opponents you have. (To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.") Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Haunting Imitation
card.property: Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each creature card revealed this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's 1/1, it's a Spirit in addition to its other types, and it has flying. If no creature cards were revealed this way, return Haunting Imitation to its owner's hand.

card.name: Occult Epiphany
card.property: Draw X cards, then discard X cards. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying for each card type among cards discarded this way.

card.name: Spectral Arcanist
card.property: Flying When this creature enters, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of Spirits you control from a graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Timin, Youthful Geist
card.property: Partner with Rhoda, Geist Avenger (When this creature enters, target player may put Rhoda into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Flying At the beginning of each combat, tap up to one target creature.

card.name: Crossway Troublemakers
card.property: Attacking Vampires you control have deathtouch and lifelink. (Any amount of damage they deal to a creature is enough to destroy it. Damage dealt by those creatures also causes their controller to gain that much life.) Whenever a Vampire you control dies, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Glass-Cast Heart
card.property: Whenever one or more Vampires you control attack, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.") {B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 1/1 white and black Vampire creature token with lifelink. {B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact and thirteen Blood tokens: Each opponent loses 13 life and you gain 13 life.

card.name: Kamber, the Plunderer
card.property: Partner with Laurine, the Diversion (When this creature enters, target player may put Laurine into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Lifelink Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you gain 1 life and create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.")

card.name: Olivia's Wrath
card.property: Each non-Vampire creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

card.name: Predators' Hour
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library face down. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell."

card.name: Shadowgrange Archfiend
card.property: When this creature enters, each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures they control. You gain life equal to the greatest power among creatures sacrificed this way. Madness—{2}{B}, Pay 8 life. (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Arterial Alchemy
card.property: When this enchantment enters, create a Blood token for each opponent you have. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.") Blood tokens you control are Equipment in addition to their other types and have "Equipped creature gets +2/+0" and equip {2}.

card.name: Imposing Grandeur
card.property: Each player may discard their hand and draw cards equal to the greatest mana value of a commander they own on the battlefield or in the command zone.

card.name: Laurine, the Diversion
card.property: Partner with Kamber, the Plunderer (When this creature enters, target player may put Kamber into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) First strike {2}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Goad target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

card.name: Markov Enforcer
card.property: Whenever this creature or another Vampire you control enters, this creature fights up to one target creature an opponent controls. Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.")

card.name: Midnight Arsonist
card.property: When this creature enters, destroy up to X target artifacts without mana abilities, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

card.name: Scion of Opulence
card.property: Whenever this creature or another nontoken Vampire you control dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.") {R}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

card.name: Disorder in the Court
card.property: Exile X target creatures, then investigate X times. Return the exiled cards to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control at the beginning of the next end step. (To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.")

card.name: Sinister Waltz
card.property: Choose three target creature cards in your graveyard. Return two of them at random to the battlefield and put the other on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Breathkeeper Seraph
card.property: Flying, soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Breathkeeper Seraph is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "When this creature dies, you may return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep."

card.name: Wedding Ring
card.property: When this artifact enters, if it was cast, target opponent creates a token that's a copy of it. Whenever an opponent who controls an artifact named Wedding Ring draws a card during their turn, you draw a card. Whenever an opponent who controls an artifact named Wedding Ring gains life during their turn, you gain that much life.

card.name: Imperious Mindbreaker
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Imperious Mindbreaker is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "Whenever this creature attacks, each opponent mills cards equal to its toughness."

card.name: Doom Weaver
card.property: Reach Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Doom Weaver is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "When this creature dies, draw cards equal to its power."

card.name: Mirage Phalanx
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Mirage Phalanx is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of this creature, except it has haste and loses soulbond. Exile it at end of combat."

card.name: Hollowhenge Overlord
card.property: Flash At the beginning of your upkeep, for each creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

card.name: Thundering Mightmare
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Thundering Mightmare is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."

card.name: Umbris, Fear Manifest
card.property: Umbris gets +1/+1 for each card your opponents own in exile. Whenever Umbris or another Nightmare or Horror you control enters, target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a land card.

card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, return target Spirit card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Benevolent Offering
card.property: Choose an opponent. You and that player each create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Choose an opponent. You gain 2 life for each creature you control and that player gains 2 life for each creature they control.

card.name: Boreas Charger
card.property: Flying When this creature leaves the battlefield, choose an opponent who controls more lands than you. Search your library for a number of Plains cards equal to the difference, reveal those cards, put one of them onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Bygone Bishop
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value 3 or less, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.")

card.name: Crush Contraband
card.property: Choose one or both — • Exile target artifact. • Exile target enchantment.

card.name: Custodi Soulbinders
card.property: This creature enters with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield. {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from this creature: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Custodi Squire
card.property: Flying Will of the council — When this creature enters, starting with you, each player votes for an artifact, creature, or enchantment card in your graveyard. Return each card with the most votes or tied for most votes to your hand.

card.name: Darksteel Mutation
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature is an Insect artifact creature with base power and toughness 0/1 and has indestructible, and it loses all other abilities, card types, and creature types.

card.name: Fell the Mighty
card.property: Destroy all creatures with power greater than target creature's power.

card.name: Field of Souls
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Ghostly Prison
card.property: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

card.property: Vigilance When this creature dies, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.property: Flying, protection from black Echo {3}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When this creature enters, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Kirtar's Wrath
card.property: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy all creatures, then create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

card.name: Knight of the White Orchid
card.property: First strike When this creature enters, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Mentor of the Meek
card.property: Whenever another creature you control with power 2 or less enters, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Mirror Entity
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {X}: Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X and gain all creature types.

card.name: Oyobi, Who Split the Heavens
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, create a 3/3 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Promise of Bunrei
card.property: When a creature you control dies, sacrifice this enchantment. If you do, create four 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens.

card.name: Remorseful Cleric
card.property: Flying Sacrifice this creature: Exile target player's graveyard.

card.name: Spectral Shepherd
card.property: Flying {1}{U}: Return target Spirit you control to its owner's hand.

card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.property: Flying Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

card.name: Distant Melody
card.property: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.

card.name: Flood of Tears
card.property: Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands. If you return four or more nontoken permanents you control this way, you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Ghostly Pilferer
card.property: Whenever this creature becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card. Whenever an opponent casts a spell from anywhere other than their hand, draw a card. Discard a card: This creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.property: Enchant creature, land, or planeswalker Enchanted permanent is a colorless land with "{T}: Add {C}" and loses all other card types and abilities.

card.name: Kami of the Crescent Moon
card.property: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.

card.name: Midnight Clock

card.property: Flying Whenever this creature or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.property: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.

card.name: Indulgent Aristocrat
card.property: Lifelink {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

card.name: Malakir Bloodwitch
card.property: Flying, protection from white When this creature enters, each opponent loses life equal to the number of Vampires you control. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: Necropolis Regent
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put that many +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Night's Whisper
card.property: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

card.name: Nirkana Revenant
card.property: Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add an additional {B}. {B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Patron of the Vein
card.property: Flying When this creature enters, destroy target creature an opponent controls. Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, exile it and put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

card.name: Sanctum Seeker
card.property: Whenever a Vampire you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Stromkirk Condemned
card.property: Discard a card: Vampires you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Underworld Connections
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card."

card.name: Urge to Feed
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You may tap any number of untapped Vampire creatures you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those Vampires.

card.name: Vampire Nighthawk
card.property: Flying Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

card.name: Anje's Ravager
card.property: This creature attacks each combat if able. Whenever this creature attacks, discard your hand, then draw three cards. Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Avacyn's Judgment
card.property: Madness {X}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.) Avacyn's Judgment deals 2 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. If this spell's madness cost was paid, it deals X damage divided as you choose among those permanents and/or players instead.

card.name: Blasphemous Act
card.property: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield. Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

card.name: Bloodsworn Steward
card.property: Flying Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have haste.

card.name: Crimson Honor Guard
card.property: Trample At the beginning of each player's end step, this creature deals 4 damage to that player unless they control a commander.

card.name: Falkenrath Gorger
card.property: Each Vampire creature card you own that isn't on the battlefield has madness. The madness cost is equal to its mana cost. (If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Mob Rule
card.property: Choose one — • Gain control of all creatures with power 4 or greater until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn. • Gain control of all creatures with power 3 or less until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Molten Echoes
card.property: As this enchantment enters, choose a creature type. Whenever a nontoken creature you control of the chosen type enters, create a token that's a copy of that creature. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Rakish Heir
card.property: Whenever a Vampire you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Stensia Masquerade
card.property: Attacking creatures you control have first strike. Whenever a Vampire you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Stromkirk Occultist
card.property: Trample Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Vandalblast
card.property: Destroy target artifact you don't control. Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

card.name: Dovin, Grand Arbiter
card.property: +1: Until end of turn, whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a loyalty counter on Dovin. −1: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. You gain 1 life. −7: Look at the top ten cards of your library. Put three of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
